Module AppointmentScheduleAPP
Package Controller

Class UpdateCustomerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.UpdateCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class update a customer and saves it to the database. Multiple combo boxes are used so the user can make a specific selection. Checks are made throughout the process validating that the data meet the specifications.

    • updateCountrySelection

      public void updateCountrySelection(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent actionEvent)
      Clears the selection in the updateDivisionCombo combo box and sets the value to null after the updateCountrySelection is selected. Sets the updateCountryCombo combo box with the country list.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Selecting the updateCountryCombo combo box.

    • onSelectCustomer

      public void onSelectCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Filters the list of divisions in the newDivisionCombo combo box based on the country selection in the updateCountryCombo combo box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Selecting the updateCountryCombo combo box.

    • onActSaveCustList

      public void onActSaveCustList(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Verifies that all fields are completed. If data is missing, an alert shows requesting user to complete all of the fields. Pulls data from the fields and saves to the customer table in the database. Alerts the user that the customer information was saved. Opens the CustomerList fxml.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pressing the #onActSaveCustList button

    • onActNoSaveCustList

      public void onActNoSaveCustList(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Alerts the user that any data in the form will be lost. Opens the CustomerList fxml if the user selects "Yes".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Pressing the #onActNoSaveCustList button
      Throws:
      IOException
